name: Laser Rings Lite
description:
Laser Rings is a super addictive Match 3 Game with Colorful graphics. Laser Rings have 9 different color rings in 3 sizes and multiple game modes. Each game mode has different challenges and needs different strategies to get the high score.
Stack the rings of the same color into a straight line to destroy them. The game ends when there’s no space left to place any more rings. Easy to play. Hard to master.

FEATURES OF LASER RINGS:
Beautiful visual and sound effects.
A New kind of "match 3" game.
4 different Gameplay modes.
-Classic: It has a 3*3 grid with 9 dots and 3 rings will spawn at one time.
-Diamond: It has a Diamond grid with 13 dots and 3 rings will spawn at one time.
-One Ring: It has a 3*3 grid with 9 dots and only 1 ring will spawn at one time.
-Time Trail: It has a 3*3 grid with 9 dots and 3 rings will spawn at one time for a limited time. Blast the rings to increase the time.

HOW TO PLAY LASER RINGS:
Drag and drop the rings on the give points.
Try to make a match with 3 rings of the same color in any straight line or on top of each other and blast the rings.
Blast all the rings to make space for new rings.
* Try making combos to get the high score.

Liked the game? We would love to get your feedback!

Thank You!
